resources.string: Specify the desired PIN code to log in to the application at a later time.
Next, the application will ask you for permission for the following services of your device

Read storage: to set your device's wallpaper as the background of your lock screen
 Disable battery optimizing: for the lock screen and the service to run in the background
 Device administration: to be able to lock the screen
 Phone state and calls: to check the call from the lock screen and to be able to call the parent's number
 Draw overlays: for launch and showing lockscreen always if need
